code: import React,{useRef,useEffect}from"react";import{connect}from"react-redux";var Bpm=function Bpm(props){var container=useRef(null);useEffect(function(){var bpm="000";if(props.bpm&&props.bpm!=="calculating"){bpm=props.bpm.toFixed(2);}container.current.textContent=bpm;},[props.bpm,container]);return React.createElement("span",{className:"track-bpm-init",ref:container});};var mapsStateToProps=function mapsStateToProps(state,ownProps){return{bpm:state.console.channel[ownProps.name].track.bpm};};export default connect(mapsStateToProps)(Bpm);
